products.name: iPhone 13 Pro
products.desc: The iPhone 13 Pro is Apple's flagship smartphone with a powerful A15 Bionic chip, a stunning Super Retina XDR display, and an advanced triple-camera system. It offers exceptional performance, enhanced photography capabilities, and a premium design.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
products.desc: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is a top-of-the-line smartphone featuring a large Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, a powerful Exynos 2100 or Snapdragon 888 processor, and a versatile quad-camera system. It offers a premium experience with excellent performance and advanced camera capabilities.

products.name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
products.desc: The Google Pixel 6 Pro is a flagship smartphone powered by Google's custom-designed Tensor chip. It features a high-refresh-rate OLED display, advanced computational photography capabilities, and seamless integration with Google services.

products.name: OnePlus 9 Pro
products.desc: The OnePlus 9 Pro is a premium smartphone that combines powerful performance with a smooth 120Hz AMOLED display. It features Hasselblad-tuned cameras, Warp Charge fast charging, and a sleek design.

products.name: Xiaomi Mi 11
products.desc: The Xiaomi Mi 11 is a flagship smartphone with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor, a vibrant AMOLED display, and a versatile triple-camera system. It offers high-end features and performance at a competitive price.
